CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_FIELD_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: How did you hear about us?
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Explore our wide range of smartphones and find the one that fits your lifestyle
FEATURE_1_BODY: Browse through a comprehensive collection of the latest smartphones from all major brands, with detailed specifications and high-quality images.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Compare prices across multiple retailers to find the best deals on your desired mobile phone, saving you time and money.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Read in-depth reviews from tech experts and real users to make informed decisions about your next smartphone purchase.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Get tailored phone suggestions based on your preferences, usage patterns, and budget to find the perfect device for you.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Instantly calculate the trade-in value of your current phone to help offset the cost of your new device.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Access troubleshooting guides, software update information, and live chat support for all your mobile phone queries and issues.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common queries about our mobile phone app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What devices is the app compatible with?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app is compatible with both iOS and Android devices, supporting a wide range of smartphones and tablets.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How do I download and install the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Simply visit the App Store (for iOS) or Google Play Store (for Android), search for our app name, and tap 'Install'. Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the installation.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Is the app free to use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, our app is free to download and use. However, some premium features may require in-app purchases or a subscription.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How often is the app updated?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We regularly update our app to improve performance, add new features, and fix any issues. We recommend enabling automatic updates to ensure you always have the latest version.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: How can I contact customer support?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: For any issues or queries, you can reach our customer support team through the 'Help' section in the app or by emailing support@ourmobileapp.com. We aim to respond within 24 hours.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What makes our mobile phones unique?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our mobile phones combine cutting-edge technology with sleek design, offering superior performance and user experience at competitive prices.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Are our phones compatible with all carriers?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes, our phones are unlocked and compatible with major carriers worldwide. You can easily switch between networks without changing your device.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What is the warranty policy for our phones?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: We offer a comprehensive 2-year warranty on all our mobile phones, covering manufacturing defects and ensuring peace of mind for our customers.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Do we offer trade-in options for old devices?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Absolutely! We have a trade-in program that allows you to exchange your old device for credit towards a new purchase, making upgrades more affordable.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: 5G-enabled, A15 Bionic chip, Pro camera system
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: Google Tensor chip, 50MP main camera, Android 12
